summary: Expelled from his local darts team, a mild mannered newsagent rushes across the country to the final on his own.
cast: Michael Sheen|Mark Addy|Jim Carter|Celia Imrie|Ruth Jones|Phillipa Peak|Jane Robbins|Paul Shane|Mark Strong|Joe Dempsie|Silas-Paul Simpson|Russell Hayes|Alan Williams|Bill Rodgers|James Corden|Rupert Procter|Rob Jarvis|Paul Slack|Emily Aston|Jade Rhodes|Kate Rusby|Raymond Waring|Romy Baskerville|Tony Monroe|Margaret Blakemore|Russ Bray|Jason Hamer|Eric Bristow|Mel Gibson|Hazel Monaghan|Paul Popplewell
title: Volver a empezar
